<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Convincing Illusion](/Feats.aspx?ID=5032) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 202 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Trigger**
A creature succeeded, but didn’t critically succeed, at a Perception check or Will save to disbelieve an illusion from a spell that you cast

**Requirements**
You are within 30 feet of the observer and the illusion

</column>

---

You use your deceptive skills to make your illusions seem even more real. Attempt a Deception check against the target’s Perception DC. If you succeed, the target fails to disbelieve the illusion.
name: Convincing Illusion
requirement: You are within 30 feet of the observer and the illusion
